pageContent: LOGINLOGOUTHELPPrinter FriendlyPageEarthfiles, news category.Share:DiggFacebookStumbleUponCrop Formation Update as of May 21, 2000 - Part 2© 2000 by Linda Moulton HoweMay 1, 2000 Between Kassel and Zierenberg near little village calledBurghasungen - Two circles connected by looping path way. A few days laternear Kassel at Gut Rangen, a simple circle was also found in greener oilseedrape (canola). See May 21, 2000 Earthfiles.com report.May 2, 2000 Sardegna, Italy - Adriano Forgione, Director of HERA Magazinereports: "A crop formation on the Island of Sardegna, Italy appeared to bediscovered May 2nd. The formation is composed of a circular shape with otherthree little (ones around it): three little rings, an Egyptian crux (ankh) and alittle key. The length of the entire formation is 32 meters. Sardegna, likesouthwest England, is a land full of megalithic Neolithic structures. (Nophotographs yet available).May 13, 2000 Lockeridge, Wiltshire - Two triangles of different sizes touchingpoint to point in flowering oilseed rape. Stuart Dike ofwww.cropcircleconnector.com took this photograph and reported, "The floorpattern on the smaller of the two triangles was not spiraled, but flattened inthree directions in unison with its three sides. But the larger two triangles had afloor pattern flowing in one direction up to its apex. The smaller triangle hadsides in these lengths: 5.6, 6.5 and 6.2 meters. The larger triangle had sides 8.3meters at the base with 14.3 meters and 16.5 meters along the left and sidetramline." Stuart and another photographer, Peter R. Sorensen, both commentedon many broken stems snapped half way down in these triangles raisingsuspicions of human creation. See more details athttp://www.cropcircleconnector.com.Photograph © 2000 by Stuart Dike, http://www.cropcircleconnector.com/.

Photograph © 2000 by Peter R. Sorensen, http://cropcircleconnector.com/Sorensen/PeterSorensen99.html.May 14, 2000 Wrotham near Farningham, Kent - Second formation in springof 2000 in Kent County between Wrotham and Farningham. Can be seen fromthe M20 going toward London. Graham Tucker of the Medway Crop CircleResearch group reported that the young barley is already springing up and thefarmer will not give permission for anyone to enter for closer examination. Seemore details at http://www.cropcircleconnector.com.Photograph © 2000 by Andrew King.May 18, 2000 Stantonbury Hill near Bristol, England - Julia Set of 21 circlesin barley.See more details at http://www.cropcircleconnector.com.Video image © 2000 by Stuart Dike and assembled by A. J. Samuels.May 20, 2000 East Field, Alton Barnes, Wiltshire - 5- pointed star inside acircle of barley. The star appears to have been divided some how. Aerials yet tobe photographed. See earthfiles.com May 22, 2000 report from Peter R.Sorensen.Photograph from Woodborough Hill overlooking East Field © 2000 by Peter R. Sorensen,
